name: Superhoops Basketball 2016
description:
SUPERHOOPS! Amazing basketball game, stunning 3D graphics, addictive game play and basketball action like you never seen before. This basketball game has pushed the limits for mobile gaming everything from gameplay, graphics and effects feels and looks awesome.

Choose to play Cash Battles online against people around the world, or play the Daily Challenge and rank top 10 for rewards.

The Ultimate Arcade style basketball game on the Appstore offers you 1 on 1 Arcade hoops, World Wide High-Score list with huge rewards and HEAD 2 HEAD co-play on the iPad.

Earn cash and upgrade your ball performance and compete to rank Nr.1 SUPERHOOPS Basketball player in the world.

- Amazing Arcade 3D Graphics
- Super effects never seen before
- Super powers to level up your game
- Online multi-player game experience
- Loads of Basketballs with Super Powers
- Daily Challenge battling the worlds best players

SUPERHOOPS brings Arcade style basketball hoops to your device!

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your iTunes account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- Network connection is required to enable the game.
- This game permits users to interact with one another. Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons under age of 13.
- If you have a problem with this game, please contact us at: www.sozap.com/support
